## âœ… Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

### Documentation

- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README if necessary
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for new functions/components

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have checked that no unnecessary dependencies were added
- [ ] All new dependencies are properly justified in the PR description
- [ ] I have updated the package.json version if this is a release PR

### Breaking Changes

- [ ] I have documented any breaking changes
- [ ] I have updated migration guides if necessary
- [ ] I have considered backward compatibility
